content.title: View the App
content.body:
1. On your Volt MX App, click Launch.
    If you are prompted to provide the application name, enter SampleLogin and click Launch.
  2. Use the following sample user credentials for a successful login
    • Username: testuser@samples.woodburn.com
    • Password: test@123
  3. To Exit the preview, swipe two fingers from left to right or shake your mobile.
